meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ken Kaplan Judy Flanagan Jim Tompkins-MacLaine Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1066.

td.p: Ken Kaplan, an analyst from Fort Myers, Florida
Judy Flanagan, an attorney from Lynn, Massachusetts
Jim Tompkins-MacLaine, a musician originally from Tiffin, Ohio (whose 2-day cash winnings total $21,201)

tr.td: THE 17th CENTURY
(Alex: Boy, was that an exciting one!)
HOUSEHOLD HINTS
ACTORS & ACTRESSES
(Alex: I'm losing it!)
TECHNOLOGY
THE GRAND CANYON
HYPNOTISM
(Alex: Something I desperately need!)

Ken
')
